net.sourceforge.pmd.util
Class TypeMap

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.pmd.util.TypeMap

public class TypeMap
extends java.lang.Object

A specialized map that stores classes by both their full and short names.

Author:
Brian Remedios
